Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
26.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.07.2012 GB SCR17464 Replaced UFB525 MagicConcat by GB730 AppendFile to build the final XML
05.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
29.01.2004 SH SCR5404 Added two new header lines to report
28.01.2004 SH SCR5154 Added new fields where REPA will be stored
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with
with new parameter PI.ENCODING from BXA360 night program
25.11.2003 SH SCR4826 Moved '-' sign to the left side of the mapped numeric
- amount field
20.11.2003 SH SCR4826 Extended SORT on DCMC with DCMC_DEBC_NO, and
- write a line with totals per debtor/client and distinct markcodes and changed
- the format regarding to the new SPECS
19.11.2003 SH SCR4810 Moved '-' sign on the right side of the mapped numeric
- amount field
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Virtuals uses to build XML string
-- ColumnHeading
-- Contents of columns
-- only if debtor clients were selected, we write XML otherwise the already
-- produced XML parts (Header/Footer) will be deleted and also
-- the stored REPA row will be deleted
-- Initialize ColumnHeadings
-- Build final XML File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Delete created REPA row if no debtor clients were selected
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- Reset virtulas
-- initialize virtual on client level
-- Prepare string for XML
-- Write to XML, blank line if only one debtor was selected per group level,
-- otherwise the content of v.StringForXml, prepared in prev BLOCK
-- Finaly write TOTALS per distinct markcodes to XML
-- Reset virtulas, to print empty line if totals per debtor were written
-- in group suffix for the previous debtor group
-- Reset virtuals for handling new debtor group
-- Reset virtulas
-- initialize virtual on debtor level, only if more then one debtor was selected
-- Prepare string for XML
-- Write to XML, blank line if only one debtor was selected per group level,
-- otherwise the content of v.StringForXml, prepared in prev BLOCK
-- Write column heading onyl once at the beginning
-- Write reporttitel
-- Write blank line
-- Write client informations
-- Write blank line
-- Write cloumn header
-- Write blank line
-- initialize virtual
-- Prepare string for XML
-- Write to XML
-- Calculate totals

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DCMC_MARK_CODE, cast(sum(DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC) as decimal(18,2)) from :1/DCMC, :1/DEBC WHERE DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO AND DCMC_ADMNO = :2 AND DCMC_CLNTNO = :3 AND DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC <> 0 GROUP BY DCMC_MARK_CODE FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
